definitions.body: suddenly (from [[פֶּתַע]], with the term. [[ם]]- (cf. [[שִׁלְשׁׂם]]), and with [[ע]] weakened to [[א]]: Sta:§ 295 Kö:ii. 255 f. Ba:NB § 216 b);—Nu 12:4 [[אל־טשׁה]] ´[[פ]] ´[[ויאטר י]], Jos 10:9, Jos 11:7; esp. of calamity, invasion, etc., coming suddenly, Is 47:11, Is 48:3, Je 4:20 [[שֻׁדְּדוּ אׂהָלי]] ´[[בּ]], Je 6:26, Je 15:8, Je 18:22, Je 51:8 Psalm [[ירֻהוּ וְלאׂ יִירָָאוּ]] ´[[פ]], v:Je 51:8, Job 5:3, Job 9:23, Ec 9:12, Pr 6:15, Pr 24:22; also Pr 7:22, Mal 3:l; thrice with [[פֶּתַע]] (q. v.). As a gen. † Pr 3:25 ´[[אל־תירא טִפַּהַר פ]] of the terror of suddenness, i.e. the sudden terror, Job 22:10; and with [[בְּ]], in suddenness, † 2Ch 29:36 [[היה הרבר]] ´[[במ]].
